entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
